summary: An ordinance relating to the licensing and regulating of Wholesale Sausage Shops, Wholesale Meat Shops and Wholesale Meat Dealers, defining offenses, providing penalties, amending Section numbered One (1), Ten (10) and Fourteen B (14-b) of Ordinance No. 61098, as amended, and adding thereto two additional sections numbered Fourteen (14-d) and Thirty-Eight (38-b).
